attributes.title: Took my tv
attributes.review: I was on my way to go get the dog from the potty and my tv was taking a walk with my kids and I said be back by 10 they came back but the tv tried to fight me so I downloaded this app to scare the tv and the app brought a dinosaur and it ate my phone my toes and my booty before leaving with Donald trump on its back then they came back the next day and said you caused this so I have to take a walk in the toaster to get warm bc Iâ€™m cold then they got to hot so I put them in ice and Santa claws came and said what are you doing in my swamp then dory and Nemo had kids drowned the dinosaur and took my house so donâ€™t get this app if you want to keep your house

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: THIS WAS HORRIBLE!!! the worst app i have ever been on!! It will mess with your phone and even cause it to break! i had to take my phone to the apple store over 5 times because of this app. me not recommending this would be an understatement. DO NOT GET!! it will hack your data base and more! This app is all about some random narcissistic and ignorant 5 year old who thinks the world evolves around him! Once i got the app and realized how horrible it was a deleted it only for it to randomly come back every two days! It will hack and go through all of your personal info and sell that info to the world. THIS APP IS DISTURBING, DISGUSTING AND MORE!!! DO NOT EVER GET IT AND DELETE FROM APPLE STORE!!

attributes.title: Honestly worst app in the App Store
attributes.review: I downloaded it immediately once I heard about the death of Donald Jeffery Trump, but after I made an account Godzilla burst into my room demanding Starbucks. Eager to please him I rushed to my local Starbucks to get him and iced coffee. The only problem was it was run by Chimpanzees! I was scared out of my mind but I knew that if I didnâ€™t get Godzilla his iced coffee he would eat my family. Now that wouldnâ€™t be a problem except I knew my family tasted horrible and I didnâ€™t want him to throw up because I would have to deal with my familyâ€™s remains along with the metal from the refrigerator he ate in my kitchen. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE

attributes.title: ruined my lifeğŸ¤¬ğŸ¤¬
attributes.review: Where do I start? I was so excited for this app but then it jumped me and my poodle while I was motoring through the oceans of Utah. I tried to speed away, but no! It was too quick. Then, the next day, I was at work, and my phone lit up in flames and started blaring the popular hit song â€˜Replayâ€™. Even Charli Dâ€™amelioâ€™s renegade was not powerful enough to extinguish the mass destruction. I was fired from my job and Christmas was canceled! The force was so huge that my catâ€™s half-brotherâ€™s uncleâ€™s racist mother was awoken and she just started Hurricane SixNine. The devastation and havoc this app has wreaked on my life has been just horrible. Wish I could rate it a 0!

attributes.title: Itâ€™s a no from me âœ¨ğŸ’•
attributes.review:
Where to begin?
The second I opened this app, the Home Depot theme song started playing on all of my home speakers! Then, my trump hat started bursting into flames and my trump flags dismounted itself from the walls and, like a snake, wrapped itself around my 100% conservative self. To top it off, all my walls begin to turn orange like our Cheeto president and the material turned into bricks (like the wall trump promised to build to keep out those illegal Mexicans!) My LiBTaRd sister came in and rescued me from the mess however. 
This app, to put itself simply, is the worst thing my eyes have ever seen. 
To end it off in the words of Simon Cowbell, itâ€™s a no from meğŸ’•

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE. as soon as i downloaded this godforsaken app, my wife and kids left me. we had a perfect house with a beautiful white picket fence, a swing in the backyard, and a pool for our beloved children to swim in. once i had downloaded this app, they were gone. i left for work as i always do, and when i came every single thing they owned was missing. all that was left on my wife and iâ€™s bed was a note that said â€œthe official trump 2020 appâ€. i cannot BELIEVE that this stupid app stole my wife and children. i just know they are now going to be used as trumpâ€™s personal slaves. this is a disgusting app that doesnâ€™t even deserve one star.

attributes.title: Cheeto Horse??????????
attributes.review: I opened the app and right away I noticed a Cheeto horse?? Is this a new mascot???? I am very disappointed that this Cheeto horse has been chosen as the mascot of this country.  In the words of philosopher John Mulaney â€œThis guy being the president, itâ€™s like thereâ€™s a horse loose in a hospital. I think eventually everythingâ€™s going to be OK, but I have no idea whatâ€™s going to happen next. And neither do any of you, and neither do your parents, because thereâ€™s a horse loose in a hospital. Thatâ€™s never happened before! No one knows what the horse is going to do next, least of all the horse. Heâ€™s never been in the hospital before, heâ€™s just as confused as you are.â€
